Key Match Events: Mendes scored a penalty in the 88th minute to give Cape Verde a 1-0 win over Mauritania
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde seek to match their best Africa Cup of Nations showing when they face Mauritania in a round of 16 clash
Bubista's men left it late to defeat Ghana 2-1 in a game they edged on chances and overall performance
The Blue Sharks' tendency to pick results in different ways could swing the tie in their favour
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde's victory over Mauritania was a historic event for the Blue Sharks, who have never made it past the quarter-final stage
Bubista's side could match their 2013 performance with victory over the Mauritanian side
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blue Sharks netted three goals in the 2013 finals in South Africa, a tally they have outdone by four at AFCON 2023
Mauritania's historic event for the Lions of Chinguetti, who had never played a knockout game at the continental showpiece
Others: Aboubakary Koita, whose ball-striking provoked the cracker against Angola, and the wide attacker's dribbling saw him complete the most take-ons in the group stage
Mohamed Dellahi Yali, match-winner against Algeria, is touch-and-go for Monday after suffering an injury in the 1-0 success over the Fennecs
